title: Bangkok Hustle II — Side Quest Day
summary: Work session at Marouch Hookah Lounge, supermarket run, Cannabis Club boost on Soi 7, and calling out the Soi 11 scam—wrapped with a clean walk back to HYDE.

segments.name: Marouch Hookah Lounge — Meta Checkpoint
segments.location: 5, 2 Soi Sukhumvit 4 Alley, Khlong Toei Nuea, Bangkok 10110
notes: Worked most of the day here on Urban Runner Episode 5.
Decided QR codes should link scenes to real-world locations.
Good Wi‑Fi, comfy seating; felt like a home base.

segments.name: Thai Cannabis Club — Soi 7
notes: Tested the first live QR; staff scanned it and it opened Google Maps.
50 THB bong use; tipped 40 THB; used flower from previous day.
Energy boost led to the Soi 11 ‘Side Quest’ idea.

segments.name: Soi 11 Scam Call‑out

dialogue.you: You're actually great salesmen — just use that gift in a different way.
I have the footage and did the research. Pricing is bogus.

notes: Prepared the lines in my head while walking home.
Kept it calm; called it out to their faces; no hard feelings.

segments.name: HYDE Sukhumvit 11 — Skyline
notes: Reflected from the balcony; city lights, meta narrative locked in.
